channel.title: Telephone on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Telephone on David Moreno blog

item.title: On phone calls
item.description: I’ve enjoyed reading Sarah Hatter’s (from 37signals) blog post about phone support. I can’t say anything else that I totally agree about it, and I’d like to share my own experience. Recently, I bought a ticket for my mom to come to visit us in New York. She finally couldn’t do it for the dates we had picked so I had to cancel the airline ticket that I had already paid in Orbitz.
